comments:
CBuild view creates errors when Windows->preferences:C/C++:Build Console: "Open 
C-Build view when building" is checked & C-build view is closed
1. Ensure the option "Open C-Build view when building" is checked
2. Close the C-Build view by clicking the X.
3. Select a c++ project (managed or unmanaged) and then select project->reBuild 
project. 
An error dialog appears:
 
"An error has occurred. See error log for more details."

And in the .metadata/.log file:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.workbench 4 2 Aug 11, 2003 16:34:45.140

If you see it again.  Please reopen.
